commentBody: Give Trump a chance. He's achieved a lot. More than most. There will be great successes, and a few gaffs but America, and the world, will be better off. Don't take his off the cuff comments too seriously, the media soon sorts those out. There will be a team of advisors around to keep him in check. Vote for Trump. Let's see what he can do. America is slipping in the eyes of the world. Don't let this continue. We all know what the other outcome will be, more of the same.
